error.message: One or more files do not match the primary file of the database. If you are attempting to attach a database, retry the operation with the correct files. If this is an existing database, the file may be corrupted and should be restored from a backup. Cannot open database "NerdDinner" requested by the login. The login failed. Login failed for user 'Nadeem-PC\Nadeem'. Log file 'E:\Articles\ASP.NET MVC 3 Internationalization 2\VS2010-MVC3-Razor\NerdDinner\App_Data\NerdDinner.ldf' does not match the primary file. It may be from a different database or the log may have been rebuilt previously.
